messages.subject: Earth and Mars in August
messages.msgSnippet: You were right Michelle: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/sci/tech/3184157.stm I couldn t remember the details, but that night we got a video of both Mars and the
messages.messageBody:
You were right Michelle:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/sci/tech/3184157.stm

I couldn't remember the details, but that night we got a video of both
Mars and the Moon, hence my confusion about the celestial event.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Earth and Mars in August
messages.msgSnippet: You are about 3 years too late. This happened back in 2003. I remember that, but it was the proximity of Mars and the Moon I believe. We have video footage
messages.messageBody:
"You are about 3 years too late. This happened back in 2003."

I remember that, but it was the proximity of Mars and the Moon I
believe. We have video footage of that, taken by the astronomers up at
PJC actually!:) Great group.

Ren, going to check out the NASA site again
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Earth and Mars in August
messages.msgSnippet: Having hung out with astronomers in the past, I was very suspicious of Mars being close enough to look like a full moon!! Sure enough, it s a hoax. Here s the
messages.messageBody:
Having hung out with astronomers in the past, I was very suspicious of
Mars being close enough to look like a full moon!!
Sure enough, it's a hoax.

Here's the NASA information on this:

http://science.nasa.gov/headlines/y2005/07jul_marshoax.htm

It WILL be closer, and give a nice view, but it will still look like a
pinprick of light in the sky.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
